statements: SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, phone_number FROM multi_factor_authentication;
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE verified_email = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, email FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT user_id, username, verified_phone FROM multi_factor_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE verified_phone = TRUE AND verified_email = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password, phone_number FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE verified_phone = TRUE OR verified_email = TRUE LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM security_questions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN security_questions ON users.user_id = security_questions.user_id WHERE users.username = 'JohnDoe'
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'johndoe@example.com'
SELECT password FROM users WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT * FROM security_questions WHERE question LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY question_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT u.username, sq.question FROM users u INNER JOIN security_questions sq ON u.user_id = sq.user_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM verification_methods WHERE is_enabled = true;
SELECT user_id, method_type FROM verification_methods ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT users.user_id, verification_methods.method_type FROM users JOIN verification_methods ON users.user_id = verification_methods.user_id;
SELECT users.username, verification_log.log_timestamp FROM users JOIN verification_log ON users.user_id = verification_log.user_id ORDER BY verification_log.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE action = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT username, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts WHERE success = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM security_logs WHERE action = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT users.username, session_tokens.token, session_tokens.expiry_timestamp FROM users JOIN session_tokens ON users.user_id = session_tokens.user_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM security_questions WHERE question_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, last_login FROM devices WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY last_login DESC;

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, a.login_time FROM users u JOIN authentication_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id JOIN devices d ON a.device_id = d.device_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%' AND d.device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY a.login_time ASC;

SELECT u.username, s.question_text FROM users u JOIN user_security_answers usa ON u.id = usa.user_id JOIN security_questions s ON usa.question_id = s.question_id WHERE s.question_text LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY u.username;

SELECT a.log_id, u.username, d.device_name, a.login_time, a.logout_time FROM authentication_logs a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.id JOIN devices d ON a.device_id = d.device_id WHERE u.username = 'JohnDoe' AND d.device_type = 'Desktop' ORDER BY a.login_time DESC;
